LanguageData.RK_Scenario.label: Ratkin Settlement
LanguageData.RK_Scenario.description: Four Ratkins, through various tragedies and triumphs, come together to start a new settlement with the meager resources at their disposal. With little to their name and nothing left to lose, they begin to build their new lives together.
LanguageData.RK_Scenario.scenario.name: Ratkin Settlement

LanguageData.RK_Scenario.scenario.summary: Four Ratkins come together to start their new lives.
